forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 56F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
